modName: Aerith - Final Fantasy 7 Clothes and Hairstyle
summary:
This mod adds Aerith\'s Clothes and Hairstyle from Final Fantasy 7, based on her various appearance from the FF7 Compilation. Available for both CBBE & UNP.

NEW! KingdomHearts Outfit
NEW! Crisis Core Outfit
descriptionHtml:
AerithFF7Clothes&Hair
by hardarg
v1.6

================================
[color=orange][b]D E S C R I P T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
[i]\"Far below, the city\'s glow, lies a flower blooming in the shadow.\"[/i]

This mod adds Aerith\'s outfit and hairstyle from Final Fantasy 7, based on her various appearance from the FF7 Compilation.

The enchanted set can be obtained in a chest, once you gain access to the Eldergleam Tree. Check Screenshots to find exact location.

It is also available in the forge (exluding Ribbon and Tie) in both light and heavy armor, as well as being temperable.

for easier access to items, use:
help flowergirl 4
help flowermaiden 4
help flowervendor 4

Use showracemenu to change hairstyle.



================================
[color=orange][b]C H A N G E L O G[/b][/color]
================================
v1.6	(07/25/2013)
 Added Advent Children Outfit Retexture by denkigroove

v1.5	(02/22/2013)
  KingdomHearts Outfit released for CBBE, supports weight slider
  KingdomHearts Outfit released for UNP, supports weight slider

--------------------------------
v1.4	(02/24/2013)
  CrisisCore Outfit released for CBBE, supports weight slider
  CrisisCore Outfit released for UNP, supports weight slider
  Renamed files for organized future updates

--------------------------------
v1.3	(02/13/2013)
  Now avaiable for UNP bodies, supports weight sliders
  CBBE bodies now support weight sliders
  Enchanted Outfit obtainable via container in Eldergleam Sanctuary
  Hairclipping issue with helmet fixed
  Ribbon mesh redone
  Ribbon and Tie NO longer craftable
  Ribbon now can be worn by Males

--------------------------------
v1.2	(02/09/2013)
  Fixed issue with Boots not showing up in the forge

--------------------------------
v1.1	(02/07/2013)
  Outfit can be crafted and tempered, in Light and Heavy
  Outfit now enchanted

--------------------------------
v1.0	(02/04/2013)
  Outfit and Hairstyle released


================================
[color=orange][b]I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
NMM
1.) Download with Manager
2.) Activate Aerith - FinalFantasy7 Clothes and Hairstyle, under Clothings Calegory.
3.) Play and Enjoy.

Manual Installation
1.) Extract files in this archive to a temporary folder, preferably on the Desktop for 
easier access.
2.) Copy the extracted folder to your Skyrim Data directory.
3.) Launch Skyrim, enable hardargAerith.esp in your data files.
4.) Play and Enjoy.


================================
[color=orange][b]U N I N S T A L L A T I O N[/b][/color]
================================
If you have other mods made by me installed, then only delete Aerith subfolders from hardarg 
folder. Otherwise...
Delete the folders named hardarg, in your meshes and textures folder.


================================
[color=orange][b]K N O W N  B U G S  /  I N C O M P A T I B I L I T I E S[/b][/color]
================================
Clipping occurs in the lower portion of the dress, cannot be fixed by myself.

Please report, if found any.


================================
[color=orange][b]F . A . Q[/b][/color]
================================
Q: Why make Aerith?
A: Aerith is among my top favorite female characters, in the FF franchise. I was surprised no Skyrim mods made an homage to her yet. Until now...

Q: Will you make Aerith\'s clothing from xxxxxx?
A: Yes I will, that\'s my current goal at the moment.

Q: Will you make a standalone Aerith companion?
A: I am considering this, but I urge you not to expect anything anytime soon.

Q: Where can I find the chest?
A: You must have access to the Eldergleam Tree, refer to screenshot for exact location.

Q: Is this wearable for Beast races?
A: No.


================================
[color=orange][b]V I D E O S[/b][/color]
================================
[youtube]_WXV4vKoXYU[/youtube]
Big thanks KrossFaith! :)


================================
[color=orange][b]C O N T A C T[/b][/color]
================================
I am reachable via PM,


================================
[color=orange][b]R E C O M M E N D[/b][/color]
================================

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31100]Kadaj Clothes and Hairstyle[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33054]Zack Clothes and Hairstyle[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39055]Aerith Gainsborough Staff by denkigroove[/url]

================================
[color=orange][b]C R E D I T S  &  S P E C I A L  T H A N K S[/b][/color]
================================
